data.caption:
Title: Rustic Canyon Home⠀
Designer: 1983 Frank Gehry addition⠀
Photos: Dominique Vorillon @dominiquevorillon 
Source: Vogue⠀@voguemagazine
Material: Golden Zelle Quartzite⠀
⠀
Found in the home of Amanda Chantal Bacon @amandachantalbacon this stunning spa-like shower gives a warm glow guaranteed to make any early morning feel better. With a light well above and the warm hues in the book matched quartzite, the design is *chef's kiss* perfection.

#frankgehry #moonjuice #vogue #quartzite #naturalstone #showerdesign #bookmatched #bookmatchedslabs #bathroomdesign #bathroomremodel #bathroom #shower #interiordesign

Title: Highlands⠀
Designer: Natalie Herbert Design⠀@natalieherbertdesign
Photos: Patrick Biller⠀@patrickbiller
Material: Desert Silver Marble⠀
⠀
It's that time of year again when we all want to get cozy and gather around a fireplace. This one designed by Natalie Herbert is absolutely stunning. It's grand and stately while not being at all flashy. That is what a great piece of natural stone can do and I love the low profile of the hearth how it transitions into the flooring. Thinking of redoing your own fireplace? Then stay tuned as we will be posting more fireplace goals in the coming weeks!⠀
⠀
#fireplace #interiordesign #design #home #interior #livingroom #fireplacedecor #architecture #fireplacedesign #winter #christmas #homedesign #fireplaces #fireplacemakeover #livingroomdecor #interiors #wood #renovation #cozy #love  #photography #naturalstone #marblefireplace

Title: Uptown New Orleans Renovation⠀
Designer: Jacquelyn Lindsey with JL Studio Designs @jl_studi0⠀
Source: @neworleansmag and @jl_studi0⠀
Material: Corchia Marble⠀
⠀
Black, gold, and marble is such a fantastic palette to work from especially for kitchens, the sharp contrast really lets the marble take centerstage but there is nothing dull or boring about the strong impact the cabinets and hood also have in the space.⠀
⠀
#blackkitchen #goldkitchen #marblekitchen #blackandgold #corchiamarble #naturalstone #kitchendesign #modernkitchens #modernkitchen #modernkitchendesign #marblekitchencountertops #followforfollowback #follow4followback #whitekitchen #marblebacksplash #bookmatchedmarble

Title: Gordon Estate⠀
Designer: Kukk Architecture & Design, P.A.⠀
Photos: Kukk Architecture & Design, P.A.⠀
Material: Aegean Rose Light Marble⠀
⠀
We bet the acoustics in here would make anyone sound like they were ready for #thevoice from the arched ceiling to the blush pink tile and warm wood flooring... being in this bathroom is more than a location it is a moment. An unforgettable design by @kukkarchitecture⠀
⠀
#bathroom #bathroomdesign #interiordesign #design #interior #architecture #renovation #bath #shower #homedesign  #bathroominspiration #bathroominspo #tiles  #interiors #bathroomideas #tile #marble #luxury #showerdesign #bathroomsofinsta #bathroomsofinstagram #showerdesign #marbleshower #pinkshower

Title: Beach Chic Design
Designer: Amy Johnson @amyjohnsoninteriors
Photos: Jessie Preza Photography @jessiepreza
Material: Gemstone Slabs

Gemstone slabs make such a visual impact to any space. They are manufactured but aren't completely engineered. What does that mean? It means you can find gemstone slabs that use actual gems and precious stones cut polished and sealed with epoxy. It's like gifting your kitchen jewelry! Although not strictly diamonds it does remind me of the #marilynmonroe quote from #gentlemenpreferblondes "I just love finding new places to wear diamonds!"

#gems #gemstone #gemstoneslabs #geodes #geodeslabs #preciousstones #epoxy #manufacturedslabs #bluekitchen #bluecountertops #countertops #kitchen #kitchendesign #kitchenremodel #kitchenrenovation #beachinteriors #beachykitchen #whitekitchen #whiteandbluekitchen #moviequotes

Title: Notting Hill Home⠀
Designer: Katharine Pooley @katharinepooleyltd 
Photos: James Mcdonald⠀@james_mcdonald_photography
Material: Large Format Porcelain Tile⠀
⠀
You can achieve this dreamy design by famed British designer Katharine Pooley for less by using large format porcelain tile. The tiles are easier to work with than large and heavy marble slabs but can be just as beautiful. ⠀
⠀
#tile #interiordesign #tiles #design #tiledesign #bathroom #construction #flooring #architecture #marble #renovation #bathroomdesign #interior #porcelain #stone #homedesign #ceramic #remodel #tileinstallation #shower #bathroomremodel #britishinteriors #britishinteriordesign

Title: Bluffview Residence⠀
Designer: Jan Showers⠀@janshowers
Photos: Lisa Petrole⠀@lisapetrole
Material: Turkish Dolomite⠀
⠀
Framed by wood on either side the white marble in the kitchen acts as a work of art spotlighted in the open concept design. The contrast of the warm tones of the orange vases and light in addition to the wood against the stark splash of white and grey in the stone adds drama and excitement to this stunning kitchen design.⠀
⠀
#texasdesigner #texaskitchen #kitchendesign #openconceptdesign #openconcept #openconceptkitchen #marble #marblekitchen #whitekitchen #modernkitchen #naturalstone #marblebacksplash #backsplash #slabbacksplash #follow4followback #followforfollowback #stoneawesome #stoneawesomehq #kitchensofinsta #kitchensofinstagram

Title: Benjamin Residence⠀
Designer: Birdblack Design⠀@birdblackdesign
Photos by: The Palm Co.⠀@the.palm.co
Material: Arabescato Marble⠀
⠀
This asymmetrical kitchen design by @birdblackdesign highlights the beauty of Arabesacato Marble by displaying it on 2 different planes. First, it catches your eye from across the room suspended from the ceiling as it clads the exhaust fan. Then once you are in the kitchen it is laid across the beautiful wood cabinetry as a show-stopping countertop.⠀
⠀
Find stone that inspires you to show it off!

Title: Luxurious Spa Bathroom⠀
Designer: Victoria Gerts Interiors ⠀
Photos: Alex Lucaci⠀
Source: https://victoriagerts.com/⠀
Material: Calacatta Azai Quartz ⠀
⠀
Like when water reflects light across the walls of an indoor pool the veins in this gorgeous quartz dance along the bathroom walls making the heavy stone-clad walls seem weightless! ⠀
⠀
#quartz #quartzbathroom #bathroomdesign #quartzbacksplash #quartzslab #quartzcounters #calacatta #calacattaquartz #calacattaazai #msi #stoneawesome #follow4followback #followforfollowback #bathroom #bathroominteriordesign #interiordesign #interiordesigner #blackandwhitebathroom #blackandwhite #modernbathroom #modernbathroomdesign #bathroomsofinstagram #bathroomsofinsta

Title: Downtown Manhattan Residence⠀
Designer: Jamie Drake and Caleb Anderson @drake_anderson⠀
Photo: Stephen Kent Johnson @stephenkentjohnson⠀
Source: Drake/Anderson https://www.drakeanderson.com/⠀
Material: Diamond Crystal Quartzite⠀
⠀
The base of this island is done with slabs from a Diamond Crystal Quartzite. The Diamond Crystal Quartzite is an amazing stone. Its translucent quality gives the slab such depth it's hard to believe it's a slab and not a solid block of stone that made its way to sit pride of place in this downtown manhattan apartment. The crystal-like veins also add to the visual interest making this quartzite stone anything but plain white.⠀
⠀
#quartzite #naturalstone #monolith #crystal #crystalwhite #diamond #diamondcrystalquartzite #stoneawesome #kitchen #kitchendesign #island #islandcountertops #islanddesign #kitchenisland #kitchenislanddesign #quartz #quartzcountertop #kitchensofinsta #kitchensofinstagram #luxkitchens #luxurykitchens #luxurykitchendesigns #follow4followback #followforfollowback #whitekitchenisland

Title: Scalpellino House⠀
Designer: Biasol Design Studio⠀@biasoldesign
Photographer: Timothy Kaye⠀@timothykaye
Source: Biadol Design Studio 
Material: Cosmic Gold Granite⠀
⠀
With everyone desiring an all-white kitchen nowadays let's remember how bewitching darker countertops can be such as this mesmerizing cosmic gold granite! To take a walk on the dark side try shopping stoneawesome.com and find a dark granite of your own.⠀
⠀
#granite #marble #stone #interiordesign #naturalstone #quartz #granitecountertops #design #architecture #kitchen #countertops #kitchendesign #quartzite #interior #usenaturalstone #naturalstone #kitchenremodel #kitchensofinstagram #follow4followback #stoneawesome #stoneawesomehq #kitchensofinsta #blackkitchen #blackcountertops

Title: Classic 7 on 68th St.⠀
Designer: Ashley Darryl @ashleydarryl⠀
Source/Photo Credit: The Renovated Home @trhnewyork⠀
Material: Quartz⠀
⠀
Quartz is a great alternative to a natural stone, you can still find options with great veining if you are after a natural look. This compact kitchen design by Ashley Darryl packs a punch, the large appliances don't overcrowd the space because the white quartz and lighter cabinets still allow the room to breathe.⠀
⠀
#quartzcountertops #quartz #kitchendesign #countertops #kitchenremodel #kitchen #interiordesign #kitchenrenovation #kitchencountertops #kitchenisland #kitchensofinstagram #quartzite #stone #quartzitecountertops #kitcheninspo #renovation #remodel #design #whitekitchen #quartzslab #interior #stoneawesome #follow4followback #followforfollowback #stoneawesomehq

Title: Athena Calderone Hamptons Home⠀
Designer: Athena Calderone @eyeswoon 
Photo Credit: Nicole Franzen and Sarah Elliott⠀@nicole_franzen @selliottphoto 
Source: Armadillo @armadilloandco 
Material: Cervaiole Marble

Even though summer is behind us I think we can all agree keeping those relaxed vibes throughout the year is something everyone needs. Using a cool color palette and a striking/graphic marble @eyeswoon strikes the perfect balance in her hamptons home. Find your balance and shop stoneawesome.com for great marble finds

#marble #naturalstone #marblekitchen #marblecountertops #calacatta #calacattamarble #onlineshopping #onlinemarket #stonemarket #customkitchens #customcountertops #followforfollowback #follow4followback #follow4followbackalways #stoneawesome #awesome #hamptons #hamptonskitchen #kitchenremodel #kitchenrenovation #kitchens_of_insta #kitchendesign

Title: 1906 Apartment⠀
Designer: YSG Studio, Yasmine Saleh Ghoniem @ysg.studio⠀
Photo Credit: Felix Forest @felix_forest ⠀
Source: YSG Studio⠀
Material: Rouge Novell 
⠀
Come over to the dark side! The use of black cabinets and warm spicey browns for the countertops creates a seductive atmosphere perfect for the fall season. Are you daring enough to take your kitchen to the dark side? Let us know!⠀
⠀
#fallcolors #marble #granite #marblecountertops #granitecountertops #laurent #Blackkitchen #kitchensofinstagram #kitcheninspiration #blackkitchnes #stoneawesome #followforfollowback #follow4followback #stoneawesomehq #customcountertops #countertopdesign #browncountertops #multicolorcountertops #sexykitchen #sexyinteriordesign #interiodesign #interiordesigner #interior #fallinteriors

Title: Bougainvillea Row House⠀
Designer: Luigi Rosselli Architects @⠀
luigirosselliarchitects⠀
Photo Credit: Sean Johnson and Justin Alexander ⠀
@justinalexanderphoto⠀
Source: My House Idea @myhouseidea ⠀
Material: Carrara Marble⠀
⠀
Carrara Marble is always a beautiful stone yet you rarely see it with such a thin profile. Rosselli architects have used it in this stylish Australian home as a nod to the polar ice caps melting. It's common to find art in homes but this takes it to another level, having your kitchen be a commentary on one of the biggest issues facing our world and to still have it look amazing is a very big undertaking yet it has been executed flawlessly. ⠀
⠀
#icecaps #globalwarming #carraramarble #sharknose #sharknoseedge #countertops #marblecountertops #marble #marblekitchen #marblebacksplash #Australia #australiankitchen #australiandesign #stoneawesome #follow4followback #stoneawesomehq #thinprofilecountertops

Title: Turenne, Paris⠀
Designer: Humbert & Poyet⠀@humbertetpoyet
Photo Credit: Francis Amiand @francisamiand 
Source: Homes to Love AU⠀@homestoloveau 
Material: Arabescato Marble⠀
⠀
Sometimes Arabescato marble is considered a compromise between Carrara and Calacatta due to its strength and price range. However, it is its use here in both a kitchen and bath application definitely shows why it should be sought out first! It has beautiful dusty grey expressive veining that dances across a clean white background. It provides that statement piece moment while still remaining classic.⠀
⠀
#marble #interiordesign #design #architecture #naturalstone #homedecor #interior  #marbledesign #kitchen #kitchendesign #luxury #quartz #bathroomdesign #tiles #bathroom #home #homedesign #marbleslab #whitemarble #arabescato #arabescatomarble #countertops #countertopdesign #stoneawesomehq #followforfollowback #marblebathroom #marblekitchen #kitchensofinsta #kitchensofinstagram

Title: Holly Penthouse⠀
Designer: Tom Robertson Architects⠀@tomrobertsonarchitects 
Photo Credit: Derek Swalwell⠀@derek_swalwell
Source: https://buff.ly/3mdqcrg⠀
Material: super white quartzite 

Despite the somewhat misleading name super white quartzite is a beautiful material. Used here by Tom Robertson he is able to contrast it with both black, in a study area, as well as stark white and warm wood in the kitchen. The designer shows off the different sides of this natural stone’s personality creating visual interest from floor to ceiling.

#quartzite #naturalstone #superwhitequartzite #countertops #quartzitecountertops #kitchendesign #kitchenisland #quartziteisland #quartziteslab #australian #australiandesigner #australianarchitecture #australianinteriors #australianinteriordesign #followforfollowback #follow4followback #stoneawesomehq

Title: Bondi Junction House⠀
Designer: Alexander & Co. Jeremy Bull⠀@alexander_andco
Photo Credit: Alexander & Co.⠀
Source: Archdaily @archdaily 
Material: Carrara Marble⠀
⠀
Using stone as wainscotting adds such an elegant touch to this boho/Scandinavian renovation project. It is a great reminder that stone can be a versatile material and used for more than countertops.⠀
⠀
#carrara #marble #carraramarble #massacarrara #design #interiordesign #architecture #stone #marbledesign #naturalstone #tile #tiledesign #marbletile #followforfollowback #stoneawesomehq #bohokitchen #scandinaviankitchen #kitchendesign #kitchenrenovation #renovation #renovations #renovationproject #renovationideas #wainscoting #wainscotting #stonewainscoting

Title: West Clay Residence⠀
Designer: Whittney Parkinson @whittneyparkinson 
Photo Credit: Sara Shields⠀@sarahshieldsphoto
Source: My Domaine⠀@mydomaine
Material: Calacatta Carrara Marble⠀
⠀
A marble tile range hood? We are here for it! Marble is such a classic look that will never go out of style. When choosing a material for your countertops, backsplash, or even range hoods you can never go wrong with a classic.⠀
⠀
#tiledesign #whitekitchendesign #white #whitekitchen #rangehood #traditionalkitchendesign #interiordesign #interiors #interiordesigner #kitchenstyle #kitchenideas #kitcheninspo #kitchengoals #kitchendesigner #kitchensofinstagram  #kitchenisland #kitchenremodel #modernkitchen #followforfollowback #follow4followback #stoneawesomehq #naturalstone #interior4you #interiorblog #interiorblogger #interiorstyling  #cozyhome #homestyle #homedecor

Title: Residence DVB⠀
Designer: Ontwerpbureau Dries De Malsche⠀@dries_de_malsche
Photo Credit: Thomas De Bruyne⠀@cafeine 
Source: Ignant⠀@ignant
Material: White Onyx⠀
⠀
The restrained color palate used in this understated and elegant Belgium home is stunning. The use of white onyx for countertop and trim in the kitchen absolutely tickles us with its ingenuity! The design here shows how you don't have to be "loud" to be bold. The soft colors chosen invokes a calm while the luxury materials elevate this space to something truly unforgettable. ⠀
⠀
#naturalstone #stoneawesomehq #whiteonyx #onyxkitchen #onyxcountertops #onyxcountertop #onyxcounters #Belgiumkitchen #belgiumdesign #kitchendesign #monochromedesign #monochromekitchen #modernkitchen #Modernkitchendesign #kitcheninso #kitchensofinsta #follow4followback #countertops #tranquilkitchen #tranquilinteriors #naturalstonedesign

Title: The Revery⠀@thereveryla
Designer: Venn Studio⠀@vennstudiola
Photo Credit: Monica Wang⠀@monicawangphoto
Source: Style By Emily Henderson⠀@em_henderson
Material: Limestone and Onyx⠀
⠀
It was love at first sight when we saw this project. Look how by pulling the sinks in this commercial bathroom away from the wall and creating a showpiece of an island is creating a hub... a meeting place, a conversation. How magical is it just by pulling something off of the wall you automatically make it more social? Don't be afraid to play with the footprint of a space, throw out the rules and create something truly unique. And of course, use natural stone as often as you can, there is no better artist in the world!

#naturalstone #limestone #onyx #bathroomdesign #bathroomisland #bathroominspo #bathroominspiration #onyxsink #bathroomvanity #vanity #onyxvanity #onyxisland #followforfollowback #follow4followback #followtrain #stoneawesomehq #doublesink #doublesinkvanity #doublesinkisland #vanityinspo #vanityinspiration #vanityinsanity

Title: Ripley Cottage⠀
Designer: Heartly @heartlydesignstudio⠀
Photo Credit: Adam Borrello and Henry King ⠀
Source: Houzz AU @houzzau⠀
Material: Carrara Marble⠀
⠀
Heartly have so elegantly exhibited material honesty in this cottage kitchen. The slab backsplash is clearly a slab it is not trying to be more or less. It is set against painted brick giving a sharp contrast of texture. Allowing materials to be what they are, gives room to truly appreciate what we have in our homes.

#carraramarble #marbleslab #marblebacksplash #carrara #honestmaterials #kitchendesign #kitchenisland #kitchencabinets #kitchendesignideas #interiordesign #interiordesigner #stoneawesomehq #followforfollowback #follow4followback #followｍe #australiandesigner #australiankitchen #whitekitchen #whitekitchens #whitekitchen #whitekitchendesign #whitekitchendecor #whiteandblack #whiteandblackkitchen #whiteandblackdecor #naturalstone

Title: Hotel Son Juliá⠀
Designer: Jorge Bibiloni⠀@jorgebibiloni_studio
Photo Credit: Tomeu Canyellas @tomeucanyellasphoto 
Source: Architectural Digest⠀@archdigest 
Material: Travertine⠀
⠀
Often an overlooked material for countertops, kudos to Jorge Bibiloni for selecting this beautiful travertine for these beautiful hotel suits in Mallorca. Don't be afraid to explore other options for countertops besides the usual granite, quartz or marble. Just look at these stunning and elegant results!

#travertine #travertinecountertop #travertinecountertops #travertinecounters #deluxesuite #mallorca #followforfollowback #follow4followback #followtrain #stoneawesomehq #naturalstone #naturalstonecountertops #suitedesign #countertopdesigns

Title: Gallery House⠀
Designer: Noa Santos @noasantos 
Photo Credit: Noa Santos⠀
Source: Luxe Interiors & Design @Luxemagazine⠀
Material: Guatemala Verde Marble⠀
⠀
Noa Santos wanted to invoke the feeling of being enveloped when you stepped into this bathroom. His use of this bold and unforgettable green marble creates such an impact even without stepping into the bathroom. Be more courageous with design and create spaces that will stay with your visitors long after they have left.⠀
⠀
#marble #verdemarble #guatemalaverde #luxe #luxeinteriors #gallery #marblecountertops #marblesink #sinkdesign #marblesinks #marblecountertop #marblewall #marblewalls #follow #follow4followback #followforfollowback #stoneawesome #stoneawesomehq #interiordesign #interiordesigner #bathroomdesign #bathroomdesigns #marblebathroom #marblebathrooms #bathroom #bolddesign #boldinteriors #boldinteriordesings

Title: Serene Dream⠀
Designer: Bailey Austin Design⠀@baileyaustindesign
Photo Credit: Kacey Gilpin⠀@kaceygilpin
Source: Bailey Austin Design⠀
Material: Quartz and Glass⠀
⠀
This glass front apron sink is a GAME CHANGER. The use of a contrasting material actually highlights the beautiful white stone sink and makes it stand out more. Using more than just white stone in your dream kitchen can be a great way to emphasize the beautiful white stone even more.

#quartz #quartzcountertops #quartzkitchen #kitchendesign #kitchencountertops #kitchensink #kitchensinks #apronsink #sinkdesign #stonesink #glasssink #stoneawesome #followforfollowback #follow4followback #followtrain #stoneawesomehq #whitekitchen #whitekitchens #whitekitchendesign
